channel.title: Omg, I need help badly, please look!
channel.description: I did everything that it said on the "how to make a server" thread in rs2 tuts forums, and im on it, but when i go to register my server to moparscape server list it says my server is offline and needs to be online before i can add it???? Isn't my server online?? im playing?? How do i get it online??

item.title: Omg, I need help badly, please look!
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“fluster, post:3, topic:223701”]dude i spent like 1 hour portfowarding?? What havn’t i done? I went through my router and did all that stuff? Can you please tell me what to do to get it online. im really confused about portfowarding, and i need someone to explain how to do everything, the “how to make a server” post is confusing and doesn’t work. could you please tell me how to portfoward? i have a linksys broadband firewall router with 4 port switch and a wireless b access point for my computer (the one im trying to host with) and when i get enough rep ill give you some if you help. Thanks[/quote]LMFAO it should take about 1 min or less to port forward. you have to port forward your ip @ http://whatismyip.com and port 43594 and it should work. and no its not confusing, its simple. and i cant help im busy and will be for the next week or so.

Read full topic
item.source: Omg, I need help badly, please look!

Thanks
